entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 23 April 2023
